package.name: Greyhound_Connect
package.summary: Support extension for the "GREYHOUND Connect für Magento" addon.
package.description:
The GREYHOUND Connect extension provides an API for the "GREYHOUND Connect für Magento" addon that is required for the addon to function. This module is only needed if you are using the "GREYHOUND Connect für Magento" addon in your GREYHOUND software.
The extension needs no configuration within the Magento shop. However, you will need to create a webservices SOAP/XML-RPC api user and role and assign the "GREYHOUND" permissions for the extension to be able to supply data to the "GREYHOUND Connect für Magento" addon in your GREYHOUND software.
This software is a beta version for which support is unavailable. It has been tested with Magento CE 1.4 to 1.9.
package.notes: This beta release of the GREYHOUND Connect extension has been tested with Magento CE 1.4 to 1.9.3.
